game.name: Free Helicopter Flying Simulator
game.description:
Flying a helicopter and becoming a pilot is a dream of many a young guy. If you also love playing aeroplane games online, we have got you covered with something special and worth exploring. Join Free Helicopter Flying Simulator and be prepared to control a beautifully-designed helicopter high in the sky! Your objective in this brand new adventure game is to complete multiple challenging missions to clear all addictive levels. Grab your seat on your chosen plane and get ready to enjoy the best flying experience!

You are advised to challenge your pilot and plane flying abilities to get all tasks completed before fuel runs out. It will be amazing to fly a plane around the city skyline and prove the world that you are a nice pilot. No need to feel shy and try to accomplish your flight mission by using all tactics in this HTML5 helicopter flying simulation game! Make sure to keep your helicopter away from the city buildings and skyscrapers otherwise it will get crashed and you will lose the game. 
Look at the map shown on the screen and land your helicopter at a particular destination point to achieve your mission!

Fly through the wonderful city to join the amazing adventurous missions in this cool flying game! Turn on your helicopter, reach at the high in the sky and get a chance to enjoy the fabulous view of city from top! Every successful mission completion will reward you with some currency. Upgrade your planes using that money to make your gameplay more interesting and challenging! Check out more free aeroplane games for boys on atmegame.com to kill your time during your stay at home or any other place!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Free Helicopter Flying Simulator at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: W-MOVE AHEAD,A,D -L-R SHAFT,L-R ARROW TO LEFT RIGHT,SPACE TO START,E TO ZOOM THE VIEW,DOWN ARROW- TAKE DOWN,UP ARROW TO LIFT UP
